basics.name: J Johnson
basics.label: Software
basics.summary: I am a software engineer with a strong focus on javascript. I also have experience with PHP and python. I enjoy working on new frameworks and libraries on my own time and have a fairly active github profile to show for it. I particularly enjoy the to get an understanding of the challenges that certain technologies face and how to overcome those issues.

references.reference: during the time i worked with enzo, the efficiency and quality of his development continually surpassed my expectations. additionally, his communication and thought process was very well done. his time working together with react, if only he does not an easy. he is motivated and hard working on., thanks for all your hard work! on his day an independent worker and as a very proactive leader. she took ownership of a project i proposed to her and did a superb job at it. she oversaw the work of other students, organized and delegated the work and provided continuous communication throughout the project. it was a pleasure to work with karey and recommend her highly.
